She refused Koutaro because she didnt  want to have sex with him while she has other guys' cum in her.  I have a feeling this will end with the mc  getting stuck with taking care of the babies, whether they are  his or not, while the girls leave him and fuck around with others.

Next day, koutaro met miyuki. She invited him but he quickly turned her down. Koutaro spot yoshino and manager walk together. Yoshino revealed she got pregnant with koutaro's and thank the manager. She revealed it's thanks to the blackmail video of miyuki' virginity got raped by the manager. Again, koutaro got really upset. But he can't forgive miyuki who look pleased during the orgy. Then his sister found him. His sister revealed she got pregnant but unsure whose father. She did it so she can have sex with koutaro without risk of pregnancy. And koutaro reasoning blown away, blaming all women are slave to cock. At the end his sister report to the manager that every went according to the plan.

tldr: Huge mess.
synopsis: koutaro (MC) has crush on his childhood friend, miyuki (stripe bra). Found out his older sister (light hair) had sex with the manager (glasses guy). He unexpectedly saw miyuki joining the orgy, which later nobuto, mako, etc joined the orgy. Koutaro got really upset.
In the hotspring, his junior (yoshino) apporached him, but koutaro was afraid and left abruptly. Then he met miyuki after bath, and koutaro tried to pin her down, but he got pushed. He yelled "so you hate me but you accept nobu & co?". He ran leaving miyuki crying behind.
He prepare to pack (his bag) and leave the mess, but yoshino stopped him by telling him "i'm your (koutaro) ally". They proceed to have sex while miyuki & co continue the orgy (with miyuki crying). Koutaro's sister realized his brother went missing and mention that she crave for his brother's cock.
I feel like mc is gonna ntr all the sluts from the club tbh, can't wait for the next chapter his revenge is starting.
